text: Samira Awad (; born 30 June 2000) is a Lebanese professional footballer who plays as a winger for Lebanese club Safa and the Lebanon national team. ==Club career== Awad joined Safa in 2019; she scored 13 goals and made 11 assists in 14 games in the 2019–20 season. ==References== ==External links== * Samira Awad at Global Sports Archive * Category:2000 births Category:Living people Category:People from Baabda District Category:Lebanese women's footballers Category:Lebanon women's international footballers Category:Women's association football forwards Category:Women's association football wingers Category:Lebanese Women's Football League players Category:Lebanon women's youth international footballers Category:ÓBerytus players Category:Safa WFC players
title: Samira Awad
